XinxLineEdit Class Reference
[Visual Components used by XINX]

The class XinxLineEdit provide a lineedit with a clear button. QLineEdit with an include button to clear the line edit. This class is inspired from the class of the KDE project. More...

Detailed Description

The class XinxLineEdit provide a lineedit with a clear button. QLineEdit with an include button to clear the line edit. This class is inspired from the class of the KDE project.
